revised_title: Thomas Renton Elliott's Transition from Experimental Research to Medical Science Organization
tldr: The article discusses the life and career of Thomas Renton Elliott, a prominent figure in the field of medicine. Born in 1877, Elliott initially pursued experimental research in physiology but later shifted his focus to organizing and promoting medical research for others. This change in career path allowed him to make significant contributions to the advancement of medical science and clinical research.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical Science Organization
